mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Options (question_id, type, description, sort_key, is_open, is_skip) VALUES (#{questionId}, #{type}, #{description}, #{sortKey}, #{isOpenOption}, #{isSkip})
mapper.update: UPDATE Options SET question_id = #{questionId}, type = #{type}, description = #{description}, is_open = #{isOpenOption}, is_skip = #{isSkip}, skip_to = #{skipTo} WHERE option_id = #{optionId}
mapper.select: SELECT o.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Responses r JOIN Users u ON r.user_id = u.id WHERE r.option_id = o.option_id AND r.is_valid = 1 AND (u.department_id = #{departmentId} OR #{departmentId} = 0)) AS count FROM Options o WHERE o.question_id = #{questionId} ORDER BY o.sort_key
SELECT * FROM Options WHERE question_id = #{questionId} ORDER BY sort_key
SELECT o.*, q.description AS question_name FROM options o JOIN questions q ON o.question_id = q.question_id
SELECT * FROM Options WHERE question_id = #{questionId} AND type = '行选项' ORDER BY sort_key
SELECT * FROM Options WHERE question_id = #{questionId} AND type = '列选项' ORDER BY sort_key

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM options
WHERE question_id = #{questionId}

SELECT r.option_id AS rowOptionId, c.option_id AS colOptionId, COUNT(*) AS checkCount FROM Responses r JOIN Users u ON r.user_id = u.id JOIN Options rOpt ON r.option_id = rOpt.option_id JOIN Options c ON c.question_id = rOpt.question_id AND c.type = '列选项' JOIN Responses cResp ON cResp.user_id = r.user_id AND cResp.option_id = c.option_id WHERE rOpt.question_id = #{questionId} AND rOpt.type = '行选项' AND r.is_valid = 1 AND cResp.is_valid = 1 AND (u.department_id = #{departmentId} OR #{departmentId} = 0) GROUP BY r.option_id, c.option_id
